resources.string:
Hi, my name is Andrew Sartor. 

	This is my first app for Android programmed in Kotlin. I'm using this app as a starting point to explore the features of Android Studio as well as gain some rudimentary experience in application development for the Android system. This endeavor was prompted by multiple openings for the Android development team of Line Corporation in their Kyoto office. As I explore Android programming and become a more experienced programmer in general, I hope to gain experience that will make me a more marketable programmer upon my graduation from the University of Alabama in December 2020. Additionally, I hope to fully explore what the Android system has to offer, as well as gain insights that will change my programming methodology by exploring different technologies. 

	As of today, July 7th, 2020, I have experience using Java, C, C++, Ruby, Rails, and now Kotlin as I continue to complete more of these programming tutorials for Android.
